post:
AstroHost is an independent web hosting provider here in the UK. All of our provisions and services run from the UK, including our amazing customer support and of course our all important servers! We at AstroHost have a wide range of services to offer to meet everyone’s varied requirements, both business and personal, start ups and existing. Services that include domains, Uk Web Hosting, WordPress Hosting, UK Reseller hosting, UK Dedicated Servers and much more. For more information or to discuss your specific needs please get in touch to see how we can tailor a package to meet your requirements.


We are offering 50% off all Web Hosting packages, use the code AH50 on checkout
